review: So far so good.  Won't post much else here yet it's too early.  Out of the box it's working great and I like the functionality.  It is the main component in my cord cutting.  Amazon Fire TV plus Amazon Prime plus Sling TV has cut my monthly bill for TV entertainment nearly in half.  We went from $103 on our final cable bill to our monthly average will be $60ish (waiting for first cable bill with internet only).
author: Mike
